text:
Slalom is a global business technology
company, a consulting company.

We are supporting customers
with everything around setting up AWS

cloud instances,
but also very focused on AI and GenAI.

One of our reasons a customer project
was with Unzer, Unza is a German based

payment services provider,
Unzer digitalize commerce with payment

and software solutions
along the entire merchant value chain,

and we helped them to optimize
their customer service agent processes
leveraging GenAI.
We did some ideation, identifying together

a practical use case
to start the GenAI journey.

And the use case which was picked
was in the customer service area,

which requires a lot of manual work
and effort for the service agents

to figure out what is the right
documentation they need to check.

Have there been previous tickets
with similar problems?
To solve this business problem,

we implemented a solution
based on Amazon Bedrock,

and the solution provides
the customer service agents

with the right information
at the fingertips

so they have easy access
to the right documentation reference

in the ticket,
but also a linking existing tickets

from other customers
with similar problems.

So it's all
not only improving their day to day work.

So all the ticket, work
is really in sped up,

but it's also improving
the customer experience.

Our approach generally for every use case
is to understand who are the people

going to use the use case, and
what is the impact on the day to day job
and how they can use it.
responsible also in their day to day job.

What are the required
framework should be, to put around that?

Are there any specific security,
data, privacy

or bias trustworthy
AI components in that?
So we advise also our customers on

how to establish those
frameworks and rules in the company.

We are looking forward to continue
the journey on GenAI specifically,

also on AI together with AWS providing
great solutions to our customers.
